notification.headline: Feel Free To Give Feedback
notification.details: This website is a collaboration of 4 students of your college by doing what they do best, following their passion of programming. Please provide your feedback by clicking on FEEDBACK to make this platform better. To checkout the team CLICK HERE.

notification.headline: Report Any Bug
notification.details: Please ping (contact) any of the developers of this website to report any bug you find by CLICKING HERE.

notification.headline: EVENTS UPDATED
notification.details: All Events are updated and visible. And the registrations begin.
